paragraph: Call or text Beacon Legal PLLC today at (352) 415-4571 to speak with an attorney.

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Beacon Legal PLLC has over 25 years of combined experience. Our attorneys have a proven track record of securing significant verdicts for our clients.

detailsData.title: Client-Centered Approach
detailsData.content: We listen attentively and empathetically to our clients. Our goal is to help people who have been injured avoid financial peril.

detailsData.title: Proven Results
detailsData.content: Our firm recently secured a $650,000 personal injury jury verdict. We have also recovered over $400,000 for a tenant-victim in a negligent security matter.

detailsData.title: Community Focus
detailsData.content: We aim to keep the Gainesville community safe by providing foreseeable consequences for negligent and harmful decision-making. Our method is through personal injury claims and lawsuits.

valueProp: Beacon Legal PLLC has over 25 years of combined experience in personal injury law. Our firm is dedicated to helping people who have been injured avoid financial peril and changing the way people view the legal industry for the better.

testimonalData.text: Landon was incredibly knowledgeable and thorough with my case. Well prepared and considerate of my desires for the outcome.
testimonalData.author: Andre Ellis

testimonalData.text: Beacon Legal PLLC provided excellent service and secured a significant verdict for my case. Highly recommend!
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: The attorneys at Beacon Legal PLLC are compassionate and dedicated. They truly care about their clients.
